name: Neverseas
storyline:
In an era when the British Empire reached the peak of its maritime greatness, and pirates turned from the main scourge of the seas into breathtaking fairy tales for youngsters, a legend was born in dark port taverns, under the clink of glasses and a river of ale. It talks about the Unprecedented seas, no one knows where they are, what is there and how to get there.

Legends and tales of past years, which everyone thought were fairy tales and bedtime stories for children, mixed with reality. Travelers were presented with exciting spectacles, while lurking dangers, for which there was no explanation, awaited at every turn. Everyone returned were so frightened and lost that they bid farewell to sanity and are now outcasts, entertaining guests with tales of it over a bowl of stew and a tankard of ale.
summary:
Ahoy, captain! Welcome and join us to find out the untold tale of Neverseas, where time and space is a dream and you are a sand grain in an endless lost sea that careless wanderer can fall into. The main question is are you brave enough to dive into it?

Neversas is an open-world sandbox action RPG from a third-person perspective. The game takes place in the era of graceful sailing ships and pirate romance, and you are invited to try yourself in the role of a real captain of a sailing ship. Here you have to manage a team, monitor the condition of ships, improve and modernize them, and you must also not forget about individual equipment, because on land you will not protect several of the modern capabilities of your ship.
